Name: tha-groupfromthesoc-la
Author: Group From The Society Of Graduates Of Thai Universities And Institutes

Translations.Text: Thæcring rea di pra tha nxal kea sar kæ cea læw
dangnan cea cng lahmad pheux phracea khxng cea læa cng cheuxd satw phli
thæcring satru khxng cea nan khea pen phu thuk tadkhad
